message.content:
cs.CR, cs.SE, cs.DC, cs.PL, cs.SI

The paper focuses on the challenges and issues faced by smart-contract developers, particularly in terms of security. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CR (Cryptography and Security). The paper also discusses the tools, languages, and frameworks used for smart-contract development, which falls under cs.SE (Software Engineering). The decentralized execution of smart contracts is a key feature of blockchain technology, which is related to cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing). The paper also mentions the execution of general-purpose computation, which is related to cs.PL (Programming Languages). Finally, the paper analyzes the discussions of smart-contract developers on social media, which falls under cs.SI (Social and Information Networks).
